csw.examples.vsliceJava.assembly

Class TrombonePublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.AbstractActor
      • csw.examples.vsliceJava.assembly.TrombonePublisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor, ILocationSubscriberClient

    public class TrombonePublisher
extends akka.actor.AbstractActor
implements ILocationSubscriberClient
    An actor that provides the publishing interface to the TMT Event Service and Telemetry Service. The TrombonePublisher receives messages from other actors that need to publish an event of some kind. The messages are repackaged as SystemEvents or StatusEvents as needed. Currently, this actor publishes the sodiumLayer System Event for RTC, and the engr StatusEvent and the state StatusEvent. The sodiumLayer event is triggered by the arrival of an AOESWUpdate message. The engr StatusEvent is triggered by the arrival of an EngrUpdate message, and the state StatusEvent is triggered by the TromboneState message. The pubisher also publishes diagnostic data from the DiagPublisher as an axis state and statistics StatusEvent. Values in received messages are assumed to be correct and ready for publishing.

      static class  TrombonePublisher.AOESWUpdate
      Used by actors wishing to cause an event for AO ESW

      static class  TrombonePublisher.EngrUpdate
      Used by actors wishing to cause an engineering event update

      • TrombonePublisher

        public TrombonePublisher(AssemblyContext assemblyContext,
                         java.util.Optional<IEventService> eventServiceIn,
                         java.util.Optional<ITelemetryService> telemetryServiceIn)
        An actor that provides the publishing interface to the TMT Event Service and Telemetry Service. The TrombonePublisher receives messages from other actors that need to publish an event of some kind. The messages are repackaged as SystemEvents or StatusEvents as needed. Currently, this actor publishes the sodiumLayer System Event for RTC, and the engr StatusEvent and the state StatusEvent. The sodiumLayer event is triggered by the arrival of an AOESWUpdate message. The engr StatusEvent is triggered by the arrival of an EngrUpdate message, and the state StatusEvent is triggered by the TromboneState message. Values in messages are assumed to be correct and ready for publishing.
        Parameters:
        assemblyContext - the trombone AssemblyContext contains important shared values and useful functions
        eventServiceIn - optional EventService for testing event service
        telemetryServiceIn - optional Telemetryservice for testing with telemetry service
